item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:33 UTC – Details)


Underground Printing is a national custom printed apparel provider, offering screenprinting and embroidery on a wide variety of apparel and promotional products. Founded in 2001, Underground offers high quality products, great prices, and unmatched service to customers large and small, from national retailers and Fortune 500 companies to local businesses and college student groups. Underground provides you with high quality screenprinted and embroidered products customized with your designs. We began with t-shirts (which continue to be our specialty), but they are only the beginning of what we offer for custom decoration. Hoodies, polos, pens, hats, frisbees, magnets, jerseys, sweats, and more – we do it all at Underground Printing. We have Underground Printing stores throughout the nation in the heart of the communities we serve, and that list of communities is growing rapidly. At Underground Printing, it’s our goal to make your order process as convenient and hands-on as possible. If it’s convenient, stop by one of our stores to place your order, or you can always give us a call or order online. Think we would be a good fit in your area? Let us know! All of our garment print production is done in our state-of-the-art 55,000 sq. ft. production facility and warehouse located in southeast Michigan. We utilize top of the line equipment to fulfill your orders in a wide variety of decoration methods: screenprinting, embroidery, digital printing, vinyl heat seal, and more. We are proud to be manufacturing in the good ole U.S. of A. Our technology and infrastructure allows us to provide the best quality, the lowest prices, and with the shortest turn-arounds in the industry. It is these traits that have propelled our growth, allowing us to be ranked in Impressions Magazine’s Top 50 high-volume screenprinters for 6 years and among Inc. Magazine’s 5000 fastest growing companies for 3 years running.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.55 x 7.72 x 1.85 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 20001065907
Department ‏ : ‎ Mens
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 26, 2019
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07PY9566G

HIGH QUALITY PRINTS Machine washable (We suggest you wash inside out for a longer lasting print). Whether you are tailgating at a Bradley University football game, or in the stands cheering on the Braves Basketball team. Show off your Bradley University Pride in this tee. Great for Christmas gifts, birthdays or just to treat yourself to a great graphic tee.
SOFT FABRICS Printed on Heavy Cotton Tee – 5.3 oz., pre-shrunk 100% cotton
GUARANTEED 100% Satisfaction Guarantee, Available in S – 3XL This tee runs true to size and is pre-shrunk.


Previous page

  2. Underground Printing is a national custom printed apparel provider, offering screenprinting and embroidery on a wide variety of apparel and promotional products.

    Through our label UGP Campus Apparel we offer officially licensed collegiate products with a wide range of original designs. Check out our storefront to find your school!

  3. How did we get our start?

    Two college friends stumbled onto a printing press when one of their cars broke down. They started selling printed t shirts on the University of Michigan campus, and the rest is history.

    What makes our products unique?

    Our team of dedicated artists are constantly at work creating fun new designs for you, and we pride ourselves on our service.

    Why do we love what we do?

    We love finding one of our designs “out in the wild” (meaning on our customers). Seeing someone express themselves with our products is what helps us roll out of bed in the morning!

Next page

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:17 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Underground Printing is a national custom printed apparel provider, offering screenprinting and embroidery on a wide variety of apparel and promotional products.

Through our label UGP Campus Apparel we offer officially licensed collegiate products with a wide range of original designs. Check out our storefront to find your school!

How did we get our start?

Two college friends stumbled onto a printing press when one of their cars broke down. They started selling printed t shirts on the University of Michigan campus, and the rest is history.

What makes our products unique?

Our team of dedicated artists are constantly at work creating fun new designs for you, and we pride ourselves on our service.

Why do we love what we do?

We love finding one of our designs “out in the wild” (meaning on our customers). Seeing someone express themselves with our products is what helps us roll out of bed in the morning!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.18 x 9.84 x 1.69 inches; 4.97 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 20001035866
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 6, 2016
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01MXVC5GW

Made in the USA
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Exclusive T Shirt from Underground Printing, Printed and Designed in the USA. Unisex fit that’s Perfect for Men and Women. Great addition to any wardrobe.
Machine washable (We suggest you wash inside out for a longer lasting print). Whether you are tailgating at a Michigan football game, or in the stands cheering on the Michigan Wolverines Basketball team. Show off your University of Michigan Pride in this tee. Great for Christmas gifts, birthdays or just to treat yourself to a great graphic tee. Great for any Michigan Wolverine any day of the week!
5.3 oz., pre-shrunk 100% cotton (Sport Grey is 90/10 cotton / polyester.) Double-needle stitched neckline, bottom hem and sleeves Quarter-turned Seven-eighths inch seamless collar Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
100% Satisfaction Guarantee, Available in S – 3XL This tee runs true to size and is pre-shrunk.

Underground Printing is a national custom printed apparel provider, offering screenprinting and embroidery on a wide variety of apparel and promotional products.

NCAA Arch Logo

Exclusive T Shirt from Underground Printing, Printed and Designed in the USA. Unisex fit that’s Perfect for Men and Women. Great addition to any wardrobe. Whether you are tailgating at a college football game, or in the stands cheering on your university basketball team.

Products include an official UGP and collegiate licensed tag or sticker. Any products that do not have these tags are counterfeit. Show off your school pride in this great tee.

Great for Christmas gifts, birthdays, or just to treat yourself to a great graphic tee. Show your school pride in this officially Licensed Arch Logo T Shirt!

Read more

Original Designs

Our team of professional artists create fun and original designs, then choose the perfect garments and colors to complement them.

High Quality Prints

Our expert printing staff utilize top of the line equipment to print our designs in a wide variety of decoration methods: screenprinting, embroidery, digital printing, vinyl heat seal, and more. Ensuring high quality, long lasting prints.

UGP Campus Apparel

UGP Campus Apparel is focused on quality. Our focus on bringing communities to live through high standards and quality products ensures you will love your purchase.

Made in the USA

All of our garment print production is done in our state-of-the-art production facility and warehouse located in Southeast Michigan.

Read more
